sentences.en: Clean the mussels and discard any that do not close.
sentences.cn: 把贻贝洗干净，凡是合不上口的都扔掉。

sentences.en: Cut the flesh from the olives and discard the stones.
sentences.cn: 把橄榄的果肉切下来，然后去除果核。

sentences.en: Dirac was unwilling to discard his equations.
sentences.cn: 狄刺克不愿意抛弃他的方程.
把所有旧清洁用品都扔掉。

sentences.en: Discard the bacon rind and cut each rasher in half.
sentences.cn: 去掉熏肉的外皮，再把每一片熏肉切成两半。

sentences.en: Einstein had the chutzpah to discard common sense and long-established theory.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦敢于抛弃常识和长期公认的理论。

sentences.en: It is an illusion which experience must cure, which a just pride ought to discard.
sentences.cn: 这是一种幻想,为经验所必须予以治疗的, 为一种正当的自尊心所应当予以舍弃的.

sentences.en: Let's discard some of these old newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我们扔些旧报纸 吧.

sentences.en: My mother - in - law would discard them on the spot.
sentences.cn: 我的 岳母 是会当场把它们扔掉的.

sentences.en: On no account should we discard our fine traditions and styles of work.
sentences.cn: 好传统、好作风绝不能扔掉.

sentences.en: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
sentences.cn: 先阅读制造商的说明书再把盒子丢掉。

sentences.en: The team should look for and discard ideas which are obvious duplications of one another.
sentences.cn: 小组应当查看和删去那些明显相互重复的意见.

sentences.en: We will be able to discard those that seem totally irrelevant to our lives.
sentences.cn: 我们就能够抛弃那些与我们生活毫不相干的东西.

sentences.en: We will discard the old books.
sentences.cn: 我们将不再使用这些旧书.

sentences.en: Will you promise not to discard me if I tell you the truth?
sentences.cn: 我要是告诉你实话,你肯答应不抛弃我 吗 ?

sentences.en: You have got to discard before you pick up another card.
sentences.cn: 你得先丢一张牌,再拿另外一张牌.

words.tran_cn: 抛弃；被丢弃的东西或人

trans.tran_en: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

trans.tran_cn: 丢弃； 放弃， 抛弃； 解雇
trans.tran_en: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it
